Text: The US government is tracking me?  Guess I'll illegally download a movie that attempts to unmask what they are doing.  If I'm not arrested, then this must be a part of the brainwashing; a movie that I was meant to see.

Don't worry dodge531... When the idiots are herded into the bellies of buses and shackled to their neighbors for the ride to their new hell on earth, the loyal subjects of "perceived reality" will understand (a day late and a dollar short, I might add) what you intended by posting this fantastic documentary.

Thank you for your efforts.
